description: It is early morning. Cold rain is melting the remaining pieces of ice and snow clinging to the evergreens and you can hear them falling around you. Some of them are large enough to be dangerous, but mostly it is just uncomfortable. Your cotton blouse is not keeping you warm.
Someone somebody once loved, probably, is sitting at an old kitchen table. They are an adult, but beyond that you struggle to make out anything about them. The stench is magnificent.
